name: BUNKER 2 (Mixa0911)
description:
So, you have entered another galaxy or planet or possibly the universe through a portal. Well, you will have to go back, but there are monsters here that are ready to kill you, as well as survivors who are ready to give you a task. Good luck!

WASD - movement

Space – jump

F – flashlight

Left mouse button – shoot and use

R – Reloading

BUNKER 1

https://mixa0911.itch.io/bunker
